sense.gloss: three flat objects (sheets of paper, pieces of cloth, etc.)
cutting a fish into two boneless fillets and a piece with the skeleton

meanings: counter for flat thin objects or sheets

sdata.j: ↑自由↑↓じゆう↓↑席↑↓せき↓を|↑三↑↓さん↓↑枚|↑↓まい↓ください。
sdata.e: Could I have three seats in the unreserved section?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑三枚|目↑↓さんまいめ↓だ。
↑私↑↓わたし↓はなぜか、ルックスに↑関↑↓かか↓わらず|↑三枚|目↑↓さんまいめ↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑好↑↓す↓きになることが↑多↑↓おお↓いんです。
sdata.e: I often find myself falling for jokers, regardless of their looks.
